name: chalkiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or appearance of chalk (= soft white rock): Chalk soils lend a touch of chalkiness to a wine. The rice is cooked when it is tender and has lost all chalkiness. See
chalk
More examplesFewer examplesGreek yogurt is thick, dense, and strained of whey, in some cases, almost to chalkiness. There was a chalkiness about his lips and his eyelids.There is an underlying chalkiness to the surface of these pictures.
